item.title: Making only 1 npc reset not like ::npcreset HELPs me
item.dc:creator: @Killer-99-pkz Killer-99-pkz
item.description:
@Killer-99-pkz wrote:

[code]for (int i = 0; i < server.npcHandler.maxNPCSpawns; i++)

{
if (server.npcHandler.npcs[i] != null) {

server.npcHandler.npcs[i].IsDead = true;

server.npcHandler.npcs[i].actionTimer = 0;[/code]

Any Help? how to make it only reset npc id 2745

Read full topic
